dsx3PortConfigTable.name: dsx3PortConfigTable
dsx3PortConfigTable.description: A table of DS3/E3 physical layer status and parameter information.

dsx3PortConfigEntry.name: dsx3PortConfigEntry
dsx3PortConfigEntry.description: An entry in the table, containing information about the physical layer of a DS3/E3 interface.

dsx3PortConfigSlotIndex.name: dsx3PortConfigSlotIndex
dsx3PortConfigSlotIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this HSM board slot.

dsx3PortConfigPortIndex.name: dsx3PortConfigPortIndex
dsx3PortConfigPortIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this port.

dsx3PortConfigIfType.name: dsx3PortConfigIfType
dsx3PortConfigIfType.description: This objects indicates type of interface.

dsx3PortConfigTcSubLayer.name: dsx3PortConfigTcSubLayer
dsx3PortConfigTcSubLayer.description: The type of specific Transmission Convergence sublayer used on this port. Each option is described as follows: none - specific sublayer is not present. plcp - Physical Layer Convergence Protocol. adm - ATM Direct Mapping.

dsx3PortConfigPlcpStatus.name: dsx3PortConfigPlcpStatus
dsx3PortConfigPlcpStatus.description: This object indicates current status of PLCP. This object only applies to port which sublayer is configured to PLCP. A value of 1 is returned for other cases. The dsx3PortStatsPlcpStatus is a bit map represented as a sum, therfore it can represent multiple alarms. 1 - plcpNoAlarm No alarm present 2 - plcpOof Out of frame 4 - plcpLof Loss of frame 8 - plcpYellow Receive yellow alarm from far-end

dsx3PortConfigFEAC.name: dsx3PortConfigFEAC
dsx3PortConfigFEAC.description: This object indicates the presence FEAC being received by this port. This object only applies to DS3 interface with framing format configured to C-bit parity. A value of dsx3NoFEAC(1) is returned for other cases.

dsx3PortConfigNatUse.name: dsx3PortConfigNatUse
dsx3PortConfigNatUse.description: The object indicates current state of National Use Bit which is bit 12 of G.751 frame. This object only applies to E3 port which line framimg is configured to G.751. A value of one(1) is returned for other sublayers or DS3 port.

dsx3PortConfigRxPayloadType.name: dsx3PortConfigRxPayloadType
dsx3PortConfigRxPayloadType.description: The object indicates current state of payload type bits (bit 3,4,5 of Maintenance and Adaptation byte) of an E3 G.832 frame. This objects only applies to E3 port which framing is configured to G.832. A value of 1 is returned for all other cases.

dsx3PortConfigTimeMarker.name: dsx3PortConfigTimeMarker
dsx3PortConfigTimeMarker.description: The object indicates current state of Timing Marker bit (bit 8 of Maintenanc and Adaptation byte) of an E3 G.832 frame. This objects only applies to E3 port which framing is configured to G.832. A value of one(1) is returned for other cases.

dsx3PortConfigTxPayloadType.name: dsx3PortConfigTxPayloadType
dsx3PortConfigTxPayloadType.description: The object reflects the value to be inserted in the payload type bits (bit 3,4,5 of Maintenance and Adaptation byte) of an E3 G.832 frame. This objects only applies to E3 port whose framing is configured as G.832. Additionally if this object is not applicable, i.e. not E3 G.832, writing to this object will be silently ignored.

dsx3PortConfigExpectedPayloadType.name: dsx3PortConfigExpectedPayloadType
dsx3PortConfigExpectedPayloadType.description: The object indicates the current expected payload type bits (bit 3,4,5 of Maintenance and Adaptation byte) of an E3 G.832 frame. This objects only applies to E3 port whose framing is configured as G.832. Additionally if this object is not applicable, i.e. not E3 G.832, writing to this object will be silently ignored.

dsx3PortConfigTxTrailTraceID.name: dsx3PortConfigTxTrailTraceID
dsx3PortConfigTxTrailTraceID.description: The object indicates the characters to be inserted as Trail Trace Identifier of an E3 G.832 frame. This object only applies to E3 port whose framing is configured as G.832. A binary 0 in the first octet indicates all zeros insertion, or this port is not configured as E3 G.832 framing. Additionally if this object is not applicable, i.e. not E3 G.832, writing to this object will be silently ignored.

dsx3PortConfigRxTrailTraceID.name: dsx3PortConfigRxTrailTraceID
dsx3PortConfigRxTrailTraceID.description: The object indicates the current characters received as Trail Trace Identifier of an E3 G.832 frame. This object only applies to E3 port whose framing is configured as G.832. A binary 0 in the first octet indicates all zeros insertion received or this port is not configured as E3 G.832 framing.

dsx3PortConfigExpectedTrailTraceID.name: dsx3PortConfigExpectedTrailTraceID
dsx3PortConfigExpectedTrailTraceID.description: The object indicates the expected characters received as Trail Trace Identifier of an E3 G.832 frame. This object only applies to E3 port whose framing is configured as G.832. A binary 0 in the first octet indicates all zeros insertion, or this port is not configured as E3 G.832 framing. Additionally if this object is not applicable, i.e. not E3 G.832, writing to this object will be silently ignored.

dsx3PortConfigLineStatus.name: dsx3PortConfigLineStatus
dsx3PortConfigLineStatus.description: This object indicates the line status of a ds3/e3 interface. Each bit position (bit-0 to bit-18) represents one failure condition of the interface. Bit-19 and bit-20 are used to represent Timing Marker bit and National Use bit. Note that the SYNTAX type of Counter instead of INTEGER is used here as there are more than 16 different conditions to represent. The followings define the various bit position and their meanings: Bit Description 0: No alarm present 1: Out of Frame Alarm received 2: Loss Of Signal Alarm received 3: Alarm Indication Signal Alarm received 4: Red Alarm received 5: Far End Receive Failure Alarm received (Non E3 G.751 only) Remote Alarm Indication Alarm received (E3 G.751 only) 6: Change Of Frame Alignment Alarm received 7: PLCP Out Of Frame Alarm received 8: PLCP Yellow Alarm received 9: PLCP Framing Bit Error Alarm received 10: PLCP Bit Interleaved Parity Error Alarm received 11: PLCP Loss Of Frames Alarm received 12: PLCP Far End Block Error Alarm received 13: Cell Loss Alarm received 14: Far End Block Error Alarm received 15: Parity Error Alarm received 16: Trail Trace ID Mismatch Alarm received (E3 G.832 only) 17: Rx Payload Type Mismatch Alarm received (E3 G.832 only) 18: Unequipped Payload Type received (E3 G.832 only) 19: Timing Marker Bit (bit 8 of the E3 G.832 Maintenance and Adaptation bye) received. 20: National Use bit (bit 12 of the frame in a E3 G.751 frame) received.

dsx3PortStatsTable.name: dsx3PortStatsTable
dsx3PortStatsTable.description: A table of DS3/E3 physical port statistics.

dsx3PortStatsEntry.name: dsx3PortStatsEntry
dsx3PortStatsEntry.description: An entry in the table, containing information about the physical port statistics of a DS3/E3 interface.

dsx3PortStatsSlotIndex.name: dsx3PortStatsSlotIndex
dsx3PortStatsSlotIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this HSM board slot.

dsx3PortStatsPortIndex.name: dsx3PortStatsPortIndex
dsx3PortStatsPortIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this port.

dsx3PortStatsLossOfSignal.name: dsx3PortStatsLossOfSignal
dsx3PortStatsLossOfSignal.description: Total number of Loss of Signals that have been detected on this port.

dsx3PortStatsOutOfFrame.name: dsx3PortStatsOutOfFrame
dsx3PortStatsOutOfFrame.description: Total number of Out of Frames that have been detected on this port.

dsx3PortStatsAISEvent.name: dsx3PortStatsAISEvent
dsx3PortStatsAISEvent.description: Total number of AIS events that have been detected on this port.

dsx3PortStatsRedAlarmEvent.name: dsx3PortStatsRedAlarmEvent
dsx3PortStatsRedAlarmEvent.description: Total number of Red Alarm events that have been detected on this port. This object only applies to DS3 interface.

dsx3PortStatsFarEndReceiveError.name: dsx3PortStatsFarEndReceiveError
dsx3PortStatsFarEndReceiveError.description: Total number of Far-end Receive Error events that have been received on this port.

dsx3PortStatsFarEndBlkError.name: dsx3PortStatsFarEndBlkError
dsx3PortStatsFarEndBlkError.description: Total number of Far-end Block Error events that have been received on this port.

dsx3PortStatsLineCodeVioEvent.name: dsx3PortStatsLineCodeVioEvent
dsx3PortStatsLineCodeVioEvent.description: Total number of Line Code Violation events that have been received on this port. This is a count of both Bipolar Violation (BPV) and Excessive zeros (EXZs).

dsx3PortStatsFramingBitError.name: dsx3PortStatsFramingBitError
dsx3PortStatsFramingBitError.description: Total number of Framing Bit Error events that have been detected on this port.

dsx3PortStatsChangeOfFrameAlign.name: dsx3PortStatsChangeOfFrameAlign
dsx3PortStatsChangeOfFrameAlign.description: Total number of Change of Frame Alignment events that have been detected on this port.

dsx3PortStatsParityBitError.name: dsx3PortStatsParityBitError
dsx3PortStatsParityBitError.description: Total number of parity bit errors that have been detected on this port.

dsx3PortStatsPathParityBitError.name: dsx3PortStatsPathParityBitError
dsx3PortStatsPathParityBitError.description: Total number of path parity bit errors that have been detected on this port.

dsx3PortStatsPlcpLossOfFrame.name: dsx3PortStatsPlcpLossOfFrame
dsx3PortStatsPlcpLossOfFrame.description: Total number of PLCP loss of frame events that have been detected on this port. A value of zero is returned if port sublayer is not PLCP.

dsx3PortStatsPlcpOutOfFrame.name: dsx3PortStatsPlcpOutOfFrame
dsx3PortStatsPlcpOutOfFrame.description: Total number of PLCP out of frame events that have been detected on this port. A value of zero is returned if port sublayer is not PLCP.

dsx3PortStatsPlcpYellowAlarm.name: dsx3PortStatsPlcpYellowAlarm
dsx3PortStatsPlcpYellowAlarm.description: Total number of PLCP Yellow Alarms that have been detected on this port. A value of zero is returned if port sublayer is not PLCP.

dsx3PortStatsPlcpFarEndBlkError.name: dsx3PortStatsPlcpFarEndBlkError
dsx3PortStatsPlcpFarEndBlkError.description: Total number of PLCP Far-end Block Errors that have been detected on this port. A value of zero is returned if port sublayer is not PLCP.

dsx3PortStatsPlcpFramingError.name: dsx3PortStatsPlcpFramingError
dsx3PortStatsPlcpFramingError.description: Total number of PLCP Framing Octet Errors that have been detected on this port. A value of zero is returned if port sublayer is not PLCP.

dsx3PortStatsPlcpBIPError.name: dsx3PortStatsPlcpBIPError
dsx3PortStatsPlcpBIPError.description: Total number of PLCP Bit Interleaved Parity Errors that have been detected on this port. A value of zero is returned if port sublayer is not PLCP.

dsx3PortStatsPayloadTypeMismatchError.name: dsx3PortStatsPayloadTypeMismatchError
dsx3PortStatsPayloadTypeMismatchError.description: Total number of payload type mismatch failure that have been detected on this port. This object is applicable to E3 G.832 only. A value of zero is returned if the port is not configured as E3 and G.832.

dsx3PortStatsUnequippedError.name: dsx3PortStatsUnequippedError
dsx3PortStatsUnequippedError.description: Total number of unequipped failure that have been detected on this port. This object is applicable to E3 G.832 only. A value of zero is returned if the port is not configured as E3 and G.832.

dsx3PortStatsTrailTraceIDMismatchError.name: dsx3PortStatsTrailTraceIDMismatchError
dsx3PortStatsTrailTraceIDMismatchError.description: Total number of trail trace identification mismatch failure that have been detected on this port. This object is applicable to E3 G.832 only. A value of zero is returned if the port is not configured as E3 and G.832.

dsx3PortIntervalTable.name: dsx3PortIntervalTable
dsx3PortIntervalTable.description: A table of DS3/E3 physical port statistics.

dsx3PortIntervalEntry.name: dsx3PortIntervalEntry
dsx3PortIntervalEntry.description: An entry in the table, containing information about the physical port statistics of a DS3/E3 interface.

dsx3PortIntervalSlotIndex.name: dsx3PortIntervalSlotIndex
dsx3PortIntervalSlotIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this HSM board slot.

dsx3PortIntervalPortIndex.name: dsx3PortIntervalPortIndex
dsx3PortIntervalPortIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this port.

dsx3PortIntervalClear.name: dsx3PortIntervalClear
dsx3PortIntervalClear.description: This object allows clearing all interval statistics of this port to value of zero. Setting this object to clearRequest will initiate managed entity to clear the statistics of this table.

dsx3PortIntervalLastClear.name: dsx3PortIntervalLastClear
dsx3PortIntervalLastClear.description: The value of MIB II's sysUpTime object at the time this table statistics is cleared.

dsx3PortIntervalLossOfSignal.name: dsx3PortIntervalLossOfSignal
dsx3PortIntervalLossOfSignal.description: Total number of Loss of Signals that have been detected on this port since it's cleared by the managing station.

dsx3PortIntervalOutOfFrame.name: dsx3PortIntervalOutOfFrame
dsx3PortIntervalOutOfFrame.description: Total number of Out of Frames that have been detected on this port since it's cleared by the managing station.

dsx3PortIntervalAISEvent.name: dsx3PortIntervalAISEvent
dsx3PortIntervalAISEvent.description: Total number of AIS events that have been detected on this port since it's cleared by the managing station.

dsx3PortIntervalRedAlarmEvent.name: dsx3PortIntervalRedAlarmEvent
dsx3PortIntervalRedAlarmEvent.description: Total number of Red Alarm events that have been detected on this port since it's cleared by the managing station. This object only applies to DS3 interface.

dsx3PortIntervalFarEndReceiveError.name: dsx3PortIntervalFarEndReceiveError
dsx3PortIntervalFarEndReceiveError.description: Total number of far-end receive error events that have been received on this port since it's cleared by the managing station.

dsx3PortIntervalFarEndBlkError.name: dsx3PortIntervalFarEndBlkError
dsx3PortIntervalFarEndBlkError.description: Total number of far-end block error events that have been received on this port since it's cleared by the managing station.

dsx3PortIntervalLineCodeVioEvent.name: dsx3PortIntervalLineCodeVioEvent
dsx3PortIntervalLineCodeVioEvent.description: Total number of line code violation events that have been received on this port. This is a count of both Bipolar Violation (BPV) and Excessive zeros (EXZs) since it's cleared by the managing station.

dsx3PortIntervalFramingBitError.name: dsx3PortIntervalFramingBitError
dsx3PortIntervalFramingBitError.description: Total number of Framing Bit Error events that have been detected on this port since it's cleared by the managing station.

dsx3PortIntervalChangeOfFrameAlign.name: dsx3PortIntervalChangeOfFrameAlign
dsx3PortIntervalChangeOfFrameAlign.description: Total number of change of frame alignment events that have been detected on this port since it's cleared by the managing station.

dsx3PortIntervalParityBitError.name: dsx3PortIntervalParityBitError
dsx3PortIntervalParityBitError.description: Total number of parity bit errors that have been detected on this port since it's cleared by the managing station.

dsx3PortIntervalPathParityBitError.name: dsx3PortIntervalPathParityBitError
dsx3PortIntervalPathParityBitError.description: Total number of path parity bit errors that have been detected on this port since it's cleared by the managing station.

dsx3PortIntervalPlcpLossOfFrame.name: dsx3PortIntervalPlcpLossOfFrame
dsx3PortIntervalPlcpLossOfFrame.description: Total number of PLCP loss of frame events that have been detected on this port since it's cleared by the managing station. A value of zero is returned if port sublayer is not PLCP.

dsx3PortIntervalPlcpOutOfFrame.name: dsx3PortIntervalPlcpOutOfFrame
dsx3PortIntervalPlcpOutOfFrame.description: Total number of PLCP out of frame events that have been detected on this port since it's cleared by the managing station. A value of zero is returned if port sublayer is not PLCP.

dsx3PortIntervalPlcpYellowAlarm.name: dsx3PortIntervalPlcpYellowAlarm
dsx3PortIntervalPlcpYellowAlarm.description: Total number of PLCP Yellow Alarms that have been detected detected on this port since it's cleared by the managing station. A value of zero is returned if port sublayer is not PLCP.

dsx3PortIntervalPlcpFarEndBlkError.name: dsx3PortIntervalPlcpFarEndBlkError
dsx3PortIntervalPlcpFarEndBlkError.description: Total number of PLCP Far-end Block Errors that have been detected on this port since it's cleared by the managing station. A value of zero is returned if port sublayer is not PLCP.

dsx3PortIntervalPlcpFramingError.name: dsx3PortIntervalPlcpFramingError
dsx3PortIntervalPlcpFramingError.description: Total number of PLCP Framing Octet Errors that have been detected on this port since it's cleared by the managing station. A value of zero is returned if port sublayer is not PLCP.

dsx3PortIntervalPlcpBIPError.name: dsx3PortIntervalPlcpBIPError
dsx3PortIntervalPlcpBIPError.description: Total number of PLCP Bit Interleaved Parity Errors that have detected on this port since it's cleared by the managing station. A value of zero is returned if port sublayer is not PLCP.

dsx3PortIntervalPayloadTypeMismatchError.name: dsx3PortIntervalPayloadTypeMismatchError
dsx3PortIntervalPayloadTypeMismatchError.description: Total number of payload type mismatch failure that have been detected on this port since it's cleared by the managing station. This object is applicable to E3 G.832 only. A value of zero is returned if the port is not configured as E3 and G.832.

dsx3PortIntervalUnequippedError.name: dsx3PortIntervalUnequippedError
dsx3PortIntervalUnequippedError.description: Total number of unequipped failure that have been detected on this port sinece it's cleared by the managing station. This object is applicable to E3 G.832 only. A value of zero is returned if the port is not configured as E3 and G.832.

dsx3PortIntervalTrailTraceIDMismatchErro.name: dsx3PortIntervalTrailTraceIDMismatchError
dsx3PortIntervalTrailTraceIDMismatchErro.description: Total number of trail trace identification mismatch failure that have been detected on this port since it's cleared by the managing station. This object is applicable to E3 G.832 only. A value of zero is returned if the port is not configured as E3 and G.832.
